text: Malaikat troh bak ureueng lalem Teuma geutanyong pakon dum di kah Jijaweub kamoe ureueng leumoh that Hana le kuat di bumoe that Teuma lom geukheun le malaikat Bumoe Hadharat kon that-that luah Pakon han kajak barangho laen Sabab di Tuhan Neuyue hijeurah Teumpat awak nyan teuma jahannam Jeuheut that sinan teumpat geukeubah
